# Activities

## About

This page describes some of the activities students might do.

## Gathering data

1. Find a dataset
2. Download it
3. Tidy it
  - Pros and cons of different data schemes
  - Data outlining
4. Explore it
5. Describe it
6. What questions could be asked of it

## Finding visualizations

1. Find a data visualization
2. Describe it
  - What are the variables (& types)
  - Purpose (describe or persuade)
  - Audience
  - What are the mappings?
3. Critique it
4. Improve it
